lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Tran criticised Washington for the "superfund" tax on oil imports, a customs user fee, and the removal of a special machine tool (known as category FSC34) from its government procurement list for reasons of national security.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Woods also said the EC was joined by the United States in criticising Brazil for extending its list of products for which import licenses have been temporarily suspended, so as to improve its balance of payments.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The surveillance body will send a record of today's talks to the Trade Negotiating Committee, which oversees the round, to decide any further action on the charges.
